signature: Response createAllocationResponse(Request, TransportAddress, TransportAddress, byte[], int)

enhanced_by.reason: An allocate request must be created and processed before an allocation response can be generated.
The binding request may need to be processed to establish the necessary state for creating an allocation response.
Both methods handle allocation-related errors and can inform the construction of assertions for the allocation response.
Both methods create responses with similar attributes (e.g., XOR-MAPPED-ADDRESS), which can inform the assertions for the allocation response.
